SnippetCode.val:
imports System imports Newtonsoft.Json imports System.Text imports System.Xml imports System.IO
Public Class Snippet
Public Shared Function func(ByVal myjson As System.String) As System.String
Try Dim doc As New XmlDocument Dim jtoken As String = "" Dim stringr As New StringReader(myjson) Dim jtext As New JsonTextReader(stringr) Dim sb As New StringBuilder Dim ntext As New StringWriter(sb) Dim wtext As New JsonTextWriter(ntext) Dim widgetsstarted As Boolean = False
While jtext.Read If jtext.Value <> Nothing Then jtoken = jtext.Value.ToString End If If jtext.TokenType = JsonToken.PropertyName Then If jtoken <> Nothing Then jtoken = jtoken.Replace(" ", "_") jtoken = jtoken.Replace("/", "_") End If End If Select jtext.TokenType Case JsonToken.Comment wtext.WriteComment(jtext.Value) Case JsonToken.PropertyName If jtoken = "widgets" Then widgetsstarted = True If widgetsstarted And jtoken.StartsWith("W") And jtoken.Length > 30 Then wtext.WritePropertyName("widget") Else wtext.WritePropertyName(jtoken) End If Case JsonToken.StartObject wtext.WriteStartObject() Case JsonToken.Boolean, JsonToken.Bytes, JsonToken.Date, JsonToken.Float, JsonToken.Integer, JsonToken.String wtext.WriteValue(jtext.Value) Case JsonToken.EndObject wtext.WriteEndObject() Case JsonToken.EndArray wtext.WriteEndArray() Case JsonToken.EndConstructor wtext.WriteEndConstructor() Case JsonToken.StartArray wtext.WriteStartArray() Case JsonToken.StartConstructor wtext.WriteStartConstructor(jtext.Value) Case JsonToken.Undefined wtext.WriteUndefined() End Select End While doc = JsonConvert.DeserializeXmlNode(sb.ToString, "Root") Dim doc1 As String doc1 = doc.InnerXml Return doc1 Catch ex As Exception Return ex.Message End Try
End Function
End Class
